constraints.name: distinctness
constraints.description: 所有固定点在球面上的位置互不相同
constraints.formal: a_1, a_2, ..., a_n are distinct points on the surface of S

constraints.name: hemisphere_coverage
constraints.description: 存在一个半球包含所有给定点（包括随机点）
constraints.formal: ∃ hemisphere H such that {a_0, a_1, ..., a_n} ⊆ H
